document_metadata.title: Equifax Public Records Section - Chapter 13 Status Misreporting
document_metadata.primary_purpose: Document false 'Dismissed/Closed' status 1 day after discharge

fcra_sections.1681e(b): Reasonable procedures to assure maximum possible accuracy
fcra_sections.1681i(a): Procedure in case of disputed accuracy

public_record_details.disposition_text: Chapter 13, Dismissed/Closed: The bankruptcy petition has been dismissed or closed or has not been honored by the court. Debtor remains liable for his debts under the terms of the initial contract.

timeline_context.event: Chapter 13 bankruptcy discharge granted by court
timeline_context.significance: Legal completion of bankruptcy case with debt discharge
1 day after discharge anniversary, reports case as dismissed rather than discharged

violations_identified.description: Reporting bankruptcy as 'Dismissed/Closed' when case was actually discharged
violations_identified.legal_significance: Dismissed = debtor remains liable; Discharged = debts eliminated
violations_identified.harm_caused: Misrepresents consumer's legal liability status to future creditors

violations_identified.description: Failed to maintain maximum possible accuracy in public record reporting
violations_identified.harm_caused: Inaccurate legal status affects creditworthiness assessment

violations_identified.description: False status reported exactly 1 day after discharge anniversary
violations_identified.harm_caused: Systematic misrepresentation of consumer's legal standing

dismissed_vs_discharged.dismissed_meaning: Bankruptcy petition rejected or withdrawn; debtor remains liable for all debts
dismissed_vs_discharged.discharged_meaning: Bankruptcy completed successfully; qualifying debts legally eliminated
dismissed_vs_discharged.consumer_impact: Fundamental misrepresentation of debt liability status

creditor_interpretation.dismissed_interpretation: Consumer failed in bankruptcy; all original debts remain valid
creditor_interpretation.discharged_interpretation: Consumer successfully completed bankruptcy; debts eliminated
creditor_interpretation.lending_impact: Affects willingness to extend credit and terms offered

temporal_analysis.significance: Anniversary timing suggests systematic failure to update status
temporal_analysis.pattern_indicator: Likely reflects broader pattern of public record misreporting

willfulness_indicators: Clear legal distinction between dismissed and discharged
Anniversary timing suggests systematic oversight failure
Fundamental misrepresentation of consumer legal status
strategic_significance.bureau_liability: Direct bureau responsibility for public record accuracy
strategic_significance.case_value_contribution: Establishes bureau-level FCRA violations beyond furnisher violations
